commit aea0140c18a01d1baeb760bd2a0933ad1dbf2fa9
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jul 24 15:04:24 2014 -0700

    VMware: ephemeral disk support
    
    This patch ensures that the driver honors the following for
    ephemeral disks:
     1. the flavor definition
     2. the block device mappings
    
    The driver will now create an ephemeral disk(s) if necessary.
    
    The ephemeral disks will be of a 'thin' disk type.
    
    Closes-bug: #1369254
    
    This is part of blueprint vmware-ephemeral-disk-support
    
    DocImpact
      - Indicate that ephemeral disks are now supported by the driver
